description: '''Benzion Hakohen''' "'''Benny'''" '''Friedman''' ({{langx|he|בנציון הכהן פרידמן}}; born 1984) is an American [[Hasidic Judaism|Hasidic]] [[Jews|Jewish]] singer and a non-[[pulpit]] [[rabbi]]. Professionally trained in voice, he rose to prominence on the [[Orthodox pop music|Orthodox pop]] scene with his first album in 2009. Singing mainly in [[Hebrew language|Hebrew]], Friedman tours extensively and also appears in [[music video]]s. He views his music as a ''[[Chabad|shlichus]]'' (outreach) tool, with the goal of drawing Jews closer to Judaism.
